https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eQwzEK1Vn3d4cPaJE3XqBokZ3dg.jpg A look back at Charlie Chaplin's early life and career, from his rough childhood and music hall success in England to his early Hollywood days and the development of his enormously popular character, the Little Tramp, also called Charlot. Birth of the Tramp
